summary: CONSUMER HAS BROUGHT VEHICLE BACK TO THE DEALERSHIP THREE TIMES FOR A CREAKING NOISE HEARD IN THE FRONT END.  ALSO, CONSUMER  COMPLAINED THAT WHEN TAKING FOOT OFF THROTTLE VEHICLE WILL NOT SLOW DOWN FOR A PERIOD OF TIME.  WHEN DRIVING WITH THE AIR CONDITIONER ON,  VEHICLE WILL NOT SLOW DOWN.   VEHICLE OVERRUNS THE CRUISE CONTROL FROM 3 TO 6 MILES PER HOUR.  *JG *JB  *NLM.  *AK
